availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George G. Cash (Caldwell Co., Ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Savage Cash. Father of George McNally Cash, Serilda M. Cash, Thaddeus S. Cash, William W. Cash, and Caroline M. Cash. Married to Margaret E. Church Cash in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on November 9, 1845. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 339B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 464A.
"George G. Cash (1798-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial #92698419, accessed February 24, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92698419.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #12917.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, 1786-1878, Film #000851644, p. 259.
